name: Zentraly
0:
”Alexa turn off the thermostat.”
”Alexa, tun up the thermostat.”
”Alexa, set the thermostat to automatic mode.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can now use Alexa to control all your Zentraly devices! You can control them simply by giving Alexa commands.
All you have to do is download Alexa and log in with your Zentraly user when adding new devices!
